content.raw:
Followed the instructions on [#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/cloudsim\_log\_playback](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/cloudsim_log_playback).  

Extracting and starting playback are fine, but it’s looking for the meshes in the docker location:

```
[GUI] [Err] [Ogre2MeshFactory.cc:430] Cannot load null mesh [file:///home/developer/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/Rescue Randy Sitting/1//meshes/rescue_randy.dae]
[GUI] [Err] [Ogre2MeshFactory.cc:72] Failed to get Ogre item for [file:///home/developer/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/Rescue Randy Sitting/1//meshes/rescue_randy.dae]
[GUI] [Err] [SceneManager.cc:275] Failed to load geometry for visual: visual
```

Is there a command-line option to substitute something else for this?  I ended up copying my `.ignition` folder over to the home directory it was looking for and `chown`-ing it.

Also - the fast forward/seek doesn’t seem to work?  Hovering over the fast forward button, I can enter a number of steps \(I tried 5000\) and there’s no change.

‌
content.html:
Followed the instructions on #!/osrf/subt/wiki/tutorials/cloudsim_log_playback.

Extracting and starting playback are fine, but it’s looking for the meshes in the docker location:

[GUI] [Err] [Ogre2MeshFactory.cc:430] Cannot load null mesh [file:///home/developer/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/Rescue Randy Sitting/1//meshes/rescue_randy.dae]
[GUI] [Err] [Ogre2MeshFactory.cc:72] Failed to get Ogre item for [file:///home/developer/.ignition/fuel/fuel.ignitionrobotics.org/openrobotics/models/Rescue Randy Sitting/1//meshes/rescue_randy.dae]
[GUI] [Err] [SceneManager.cc:275] Failed to load geometry for visual: visual

Is there a command-line option to substitute something else for this? I ended up copying my .ignition folder over to the home directory it was looking for and chown-ing it.

Also - the fast forward/seek doesn’t seem to work? Hovering over the fast forward button, I can enter a number of steps (I tried 5000) and there’s no change.

‌
